definition: secondary/twice in the year (of generations of insects, harvests etc)
two/2/(Beijing dialect) stupid
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
children of officials/word created by analogy with 富二代[fu4 er4 dai4]
children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s/see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]
children of celebrities
second generation only child
those who did not benefit from the Chinese economic reforms of the 1980s/see also 富二代[fu4 er4 dai4]

sentences.english: Their children have been nicknamed the "rich second generation".
sentences.chinese: 企业家的孩子也得了外号“富二代”。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the application of second generation expert system in blanking technology ES.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了第二代专家系统在冲压工艺设计中的应用。

sentences.english: This is especially true of any programming art in its second or later generation.
sentences.chinese: 这对于任何编程技术的第二代及更后代尤为正确。
但第二代混血儿就不同了。

sentences.english: Byron and Shelley are usually considered as the Second Generation of the Romanic Movement.
sentences.chinese: 拜伦和雪莱通常被认为是浪漫运动的第二代。
二代是否已经在筹备中？

sentences.english: Yeah , like the son of JackieChan belongs to it .
sentences.chinese: 知道，像成龙的儿子就属于“星二代”。

sentences.english: This is already the second generation of hard disks hitachi those exploiting the technology of perpendicular magnetic recording.
sentences.chinese: 这已是第二代硬盘日立那些利用技术垂直磁记录。

sentences.english: Winkle pickers were the second generation rockers and very much the property of the early sixties generation.
sentences.chinese: 尖头鞋是第二代摇滚人的服饰，流行于六十年代早期。

sentences.english: Blue Heaven Rev2 is a fantastic cable.
sentences.chinese: “蓝天堂第二代线材是极妙的一款线材”。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To evaluate the progress and clinical application of second-generation antipsychotic drugs.
sentences.chinese: 评价第二代抗精神病药的临床应用与进展。

sentences.english: Perhaps we will even see a seven-speed second-generation DSG in the new car.
sentences.chinese: 也许我们甚至将看到一个七速二代的DSG变速箱。

sentences.english: The second generation of greenway is characterized by trail-oriented and non-motorized travel.
sentences.chinese: 第二代绿道以步道和非机动车通行为特点。

sentences.english: The development of large ammonia plants using coal as raw material depends largely on the progress of the "second generation" coal gasification processes.
sentences.chinese: 煤原料大型氨厂的发展取决于开发第二代煤气化工艺。

sentences.english: But there are also plenty of success stories, abercrombie milano, he says.
sentences.chinese: 但纽曼也表示“富二代”中尚有不少成功范例。

sentences.english: This Ontario Ranger knife is the Spec Plus Gen II.
sentences.chinese: 这安大略游侠加刀是第二代规格。

definition: three generations of a family/the three earliest dynasties (Xia, Shang and Zhou)
children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s/see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]

those who did not benefit from the Chinese economic reforms of the 1980s/see also 富二代[fu4 er4 dai4]
the next generation
family/clan
successor
rich and powerful person
to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
high-sounding speech/bombast/high-profile
to expose (photography)/(fig.) to expose (a scandal)/(advertising) exposure/Taiwan pr. [pu4 guang1]
to mass-produce
new generation
Cenozoic (geological era covering the last 65m years)
